verses.verse: Then <WG1161> drew near <WG2258> <WG5713> <WG1448> <WG5723> unto him <WG846> all <WG3956> the publicans <WG5057> and <WG2532> sinners <WG268> for to hear <WG191> <WG5721> him <WG846>.

And <WG2532> when he hath found <WG2147> <WG5631> it, he layeth <WG2007> <WG5719> it on <WG1909> his <WG1438> shoulders <WG5606>, rejoicing <WG5463> <WG5723>.

And <WG2532> when he cometh <WG2064> <WG5631> <WG1519> home <WG3624>, he calleth together <WG4779> <WG5719> his friends <WG5384> and <WG2532> neighbours <WG1069>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723> unto them <WG846>, Rejoice <WG4796> <WG5645> with me <WG3427>; for <WG3754> I have found <WG2147> <WG5627> my <WG3450> sheep <WG4263> which <WG3588> was lost <WG622> <WG5756>.

I say <WG3004> <WG5719> unto you <WG5213>, that <WG3754> likewise <WG3779> joy <WG5479> shall be <WG2071> <WG5704> in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772> over <WG1909> one <WG1520> sinner <WG268> that repenteth <WG3340> <WG5723>, more than <WG2228> over <WG1909> ninety and nine <WG1768> just persons <WG1342>, which <WG3748> need <WG2192> <WG5719> <WG5532> no <WG3756> repentance <WG3341>.

And <WG2532> when she hath found <WG2147> <WG5631> it, she calleth <WG4779> her friends <WG5384> and <WG2532> her neighbours <WG1069> together <WG4779> <WG5731>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, Rejoice <WG4796> <WG5645> with me <WG3427>; for <WG3754> I have found <WG2147> <WG5627> the piece <WG1406> which <WG3739> I had lost <WG622> <WG5656>.

And <WG1161> he said <WG2036> <WG5627>, A certain <WG5100> man <WG444> had <WG2192> <WG5707> two <WG1417> sons <WG5207>:

And <WG2532> the younger <WG3501> of them <WG846> said <WG2036> <WG5627> to his father <WG3962>, Father <WG3962>, give <WG1325> <WG5628> me <WG3427> the portion <WG3313> of goods <WG3776> that falleth <WG1911> <WG5723> to me. And <WG2532> he divided <WG1244> <WG5627> unto them <WG846> his living <WG979>.

And <WG2532> not <WG3756> many <WG4183> days <WG2250> after <WG3326> the younger <WG3501> son <WG5207> gathered <WG4863> all <WG537> together <WG4863> <WG5631>, and took his journey <WG589> <WG5656> into <WG1519> a far <WG3117> country <WG5561>, and <WG2532> there <WG1563> wasted <WG1287> <WG5656> his <WG846> substance <WG3776> with riotous <WG811> living <WG2198> <WG5723>.

And <WG1161> when he <WG846> had spent <WG1159> <WG5660> all <WG3956>, there arose <WG1096> <WG5633> a mighty <WG2478> famine <WG3042> in <WG2596> that <WG1565> land <WG5561>; and <WG2532> he <WG846> began <WG756> <WG5662> to be in want <WG5302> <WG5745>.

And <WG2532> he went <WG4198> <WG5679> and joined himself <WG2853> <WG5681> to <WG1520> a citizen <WG4177> of that <WG1565> country <WG5561>; and <WG2532> he sent <WG3992> <WG5656> him <WG846> into <WG1519> his <WG846> fields <WG68> to feed <WG1006> <WG5721> swine <WG5519>.

And <WG2532> he would fain <WG1937> <WG5707> have filled <WG1072> <WG5658> his <WG846> belly <WG2836> with <WG575> the husks <WG2769> that <WG3739> the swine <WG5519> did eat <WG2068> <WG5707>: and <WG2532> no man <WG3762> gave <WG1325> <WG5707> unto him <WG846>.

And <WG1161> when he came <WG2064> <WG5631> to <WG1519> himself <WG1438>, he said <WG2036> <WG5627>, How many <WG4214> hired servants <WG3407> of my <WG3450> father's <WG3962> have bread <WG740> enough and to spare <WG4052> <WG5719>, and <WG1161> I <WG1473> perish <WG622> <WG5731> with hunger <WG3042>!

I will arise <WG450> <WG5631> and go <WG4198> <WG5695> to <WG4314> my <WG3450> father <WG3962>, and <WG2532> will say <WG2046> <WG5692> unto him <WG846>, Father <WG3962>, I have sinned <WG264> <WG5627> against <WG1519> heaven <WG3772>, and <WG2532> before <WG1799> thee <WG4675>,

And <WG2532> am <WG1510> <WG5748> no more <WG3765> worthy <WG514> to be called <WG2564> <WG5683> thy <WG4675> son <WG5207>: make <WG4160> <WG5657> me <WG3165> as <WG5613> one <WG1520> of thy <WG4675> hired servants <WG3407>.

And <WG2532> he arose <WG450> <WG5631>, and came <WG2064> <WG5627> to <WG4314> his <WG1438> father <WG3962>. But <WG1161> when he <WG846> was yet <WG2089> a great way <WG3112> off <WG568> <WG5723>, his <WG846> father <WG3962> saw <WG1492> <WG5627> him <WG846>, and <WG2532> had compassion <WG4697> <WG5675>, and <WG2532> ran <WG5143> <WG5631>, and fell <WG1968> <WG5627> on <WG1909> his <WG846> neck <WG5137>, and <WG2532> kissed <WG2705> <WG5656> him <WG846>.

But <WG1161> the father <WG3962> said <WG2036> <WG5627> to <WG4314> his <WG846> servants <WG1401>, Bring forth <WG1627> <WG5657> the best <WG4413> robe <WG4749>, and <WG2532> put it on <WG1746> <WG5657> him <WG846>; and <WG2532> put <WG1325> <WG5628> a ring <WG1146> on <WG1519> his <WG846> hand <WG5495>, and <WG2532> shoes <WG5266> on <WG1519> his feet <WG4228>:
And <WG2532> bring hither <WG5342> <WG5660> the fatted <WG4618> calf <WG3448>, and kill <WG2380> <WG5657> it; and <WG2532> let us eat <WG5315> <WG5631>, and be merry <WG2165> <WG5686>:

Now <WG1161> his <WG846> elder <WG4245> son <WG5207> was <WG2258> <WG5713> in <WG1722> the field <WG68>: and <WG2532> as <WG5613> he came <WG2064> <WG5740> and drew nigh <WG1448> <WG5656> to the house <WG3614>, he heard <WG191> <WG5656> musick <WG4858> and <WG2532> dancing <WG5525>.

But <WG1161> as soon as <WG3753> this <WG3778> thy <WG4675> son <WG5207> was come <WG2064> <WG5627>, which <WG3588> hath devoured <WG2719> <WG5631> thy <WG4675> living <WG979> with <WG3326> harlots <WG4204>, thou hast killed <WG2380> <WG5656> for him <WG846> the fatted <WG4618> calf <WG3448>.

And <WG1161> he said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto him <WG846>, Son <WG5043>, thou <WG4771> art <WG1488> <WG5748> ever <WG3842> with <WG3326> me <WG1700>, and <WG2532> all <WG3956> that I have <WG1699> is <WG2076> <WG5748> thine <WG4674>.

It was <WG1161> meet <WG1163> <WG5713> that we should make merry <WG2165> <WG5683>, and <WG2532> be glad <WG5463> <WG5646>: for <WG3754> this <WG3778> thy <WG4675> brother <WG80> was <WG2258> <WG5713> dead <WG3498>, and <WG2532> is alive again <WG326> <WG5656>; and <WG2532> was <WG2258> <WG5713> lost <WG622> <WG5756>, and <WG2532> is found <WG2147> <WG5681>.
